00019         var $table                                      = "config";
00020         var $key_id                             = "id";
00021         var $key_name                           = "namedId";
00022         var $key_type                           = "type";
00023         var $key_value                          = "value";
00024         var $key_permissionRead         = "permissionRead";
00025         var $key_permissionWrite        = "permissionWrite";
00026         var $key_userId                         = "userId";

00036         function __construct()
00037         {
00038                 parent::__construct();
00039                 $this->db       = qcl_db::getSubclass($this->ini);
00040                 $this->user = $this->getSingleton("class_user");
00041         }

00061         function create($name, $type, $permissionRead=null, $permissionWrite=null, $allowUserVariants=false )
00062         {
00063                 // check permission
00064                 $this->user->requirePermission("qcl.config.permissions.manage");
00065                 
00066                 // check type
00067                 if ( ! in_array( $type, $this->types ) )
00068                 {
00069                         $this->raiseError("cql_config_db::create : invalid type '$type'");
00070                 }
00071                 
00072                 $permissionRead  = $permissionRead ? "'$permissionRead'" : "null";
00073                 $permissionWrite = $permissionWrite ? "'$permissionWrite'" : "null";
00074 
00075                 // delete all previous entries
00076                 $this->db->execute("
00077                         DELETE FROM `{$this->table}`
00078                         WHERE  `{$this->key_name}` = '$name'
00079                 ");                     
00080                 
00081                 // create new entry
00082                 $userId = $allowUserVariants ? 0 : "null";
00083                 
00084                 $this->db->execute("
00085                         INSERT INTO `{$this->table}` 
00086                                 (`{$this->key_name}`,`{$this->key_type}`,
00087                                 `{$this->key_permissionRead}`,`{$this->key_permissionWrite}`,
00088                                 `{$this->key_userId}`) 
00089                         VALUES 
00090                                 ('$name','$type',$permissionRead,$permissionWrite,$userId)
00091                 ");                                     
00092 
00093                 return $this->db->getLastInsertId();
00094         }

00105         function update( $id, $key, $value )
00106         {
00107                 $this->user->requirePermission("qcl.config.permissions.manage");
00108                 $row = array();
00109                 $row[$this->key_id] = $id;
00110                 $row[$key] = $value;
00111                 $this->db->update($this->table,$row);
00112                 return true;
00113         } 
00121         function delete( $ref )
00122         {
00123                 $this->user->requirePermission("qcl.config.permissions.manage");
00124                 
00125                 if ( is_numeric( $ref ) )
00126                 {
00127                         $this->db->execute("
00128                                 DELETE FROM `{$this->table}` 
00129                                 WHERE `{$this->key_id}` = $ref
00130                         ");                     
00131                 }
00132                 else
00133                 {
00134                         $this->db->execute("
00135                                 DELETE FROM `{$this->table}` 
00136                                 WHERE `{$this->key_name}` = '$ref'
00137                         ");                     
00138                 }                
00139                 return true;
00140         }

00147         function get($name)
00148         {
00149                 $row = $this->_getRow($name);
00150                 return $row[$this->key_value];  
00151         } 
00152 
00158         function getRow($name,$userRef=null)
00159         {                       
00160                 if ( $userRef !== null )
00161                 {
00162                         // user reference given, this is usually only the
00163                         // case if a manager edits the configuration
00164                         $userId = $this->user->getIdFromRef($userRef);
00165                         $row = $this->db->getRow("
00166                                 SELECT * 
00167                                 FROM {$this->table}
00168                                 WHERE {$this->key_name} = '$name'
00169                                 AND {$this->key_userId} = $userId
00170                         ");
00171                         
00172                         // admins can read default value
00173                         if ( $userId == 0 and $this->user->hasPermission ("qcl.config.permissions.manage") )
00174                         {
00175                                 return $row;
00176                         }
00177                         
00178                         // active user is allowed to acces their own data
00179                         if ( $row['id'] == $userId )
00180                         {
00181                                 return $row;
00182                         }
00183                         
00184                         if( $permissionRead = $row[$this->key_permissionRead] )
00185                         {
00186                                 $this->user->requirePermisson($permissionRead);
00187                         }
00188                         return $row;
00189                 }
00190                 else
00191                 {
00192                         // no user reference given, assume active user
00193                         $activeUser     = $this->user->getActiveUser(); 
00194                         $activeUserId   = $this->user->getActiveUserId();
00195         
00196                         // get all rows containing key name
00197                         $rows = $this->db->getAllRows("
00198                                 SELECT * 
00199                                 FROM `{$this->table}`
00200                                 WHERE `{$this->key_name}` = '$name'
00201                                         AND 
00202                                         (
00203                                                 `{$this->key_userId}` = $activeUserId
00204                                                 OR `{$this->key_userId}` = 0
00205                                                 OR `{$this->key_userId}` IS NULL
00206                                         )
00207                                 ORDER BY `{$this->key_userId}`
00208                         ");
00209                         
00210                         if ( count($rows) == 2 )
00211                         {
00212                                 // config entry has variants, return user variant
00213                                 // since user can access own data
00214                                 return $rows[1];
00215                         }
00216                         elseif ( count($rows) == 1 )
00217                         {
00218                                 // only a non-variant or default entry available, check permission
00219                                 if( $permissionRead = $rows[0][$this->key_permissionRead] )
00220                                 {
00221                                         $this->user->requirePermission($permissionRead);
00222                                 }
00223                                 return $rows[0];                                
00224                         }
00225                         return null;
00226                 }
00227         }

00235         function getRowById( $id )
00236         {
00237                 if ( is_numeric( $id ) )
00238                 {
00239                         $row = $this->db->getRow("
00240                                 SELECT *
00241                                 FROM `{$this->table}` 
00242                                 WHERE `{$this->key_id}` = $id
00243                         ");
00244                         
00245                         if ( $row[$this->key_permissionRead] )
00246                         {
00247                                 $this->user->requirePermission($row[$this->key_permissionRead]);
00248                         }
00249                 }
00250                 else
00251                 {
00252                         $this->raiseError("Expected numeric value, got '$id'.");
00253                 }                
00254 
00255                 return $row;    
00256         }               
00257  
00263         function getAll( $mask=null )
00264         {
00265                 $activeUserId = $this->user->getActiveUserId();
00266                 
00267                 if ( $mask )
00268                 {
00269                         // get all rows containing mask
00270                         $rows = $this->db->getAllRows("
00271                                 SELECT * 
00272                                 FROM `{$this->table}`
00273                                 WHERE `{$this->key_name}` LIKE '$mask%'
00274                                 ORDER BY `{$this->key_name}`                    
00275                         ");                     
00276                 }
00277                 else
00278                 {
00279                         // get all rows 
00280                         $rows = $this->db->getAllRows("
00281                                 SELECT * 
00282                                 FROM `{$this->table}`
00283                                 ORDER BY `{$this->key_name}`                    
00284                         ");                     
00285                 }
00286                 
00287                 $result = array();
00288                 foreach ( $rows as $row )
00289                 {
00290                         $permissionRead = $row[$this->key_permissionRead];
00291                         if ( ! $permissionRead or $this->user->hasPermission($permissionRead) )
00292                         {
00293                                 $result[] = $row;
00294                         }
00295                 }
00296                 return $result;
00297         }        
00298  
00308         function set( $name, $value, $defaultValue=false)
00309         {
00310                 // if we set the default value, we need to retrieve 
00311                 if ( $defaultValue )
00312                 {
00313                         $row = $this->getRow($name,0);  
00314                 }
00315                 else
00316                 {
00317                         $row = $this->getRow($name);
00318                 }
00319                 
00320                 // does the key exist?
00321                 if ( ! count($row) )
00322                 {
00323                         $this->raiseError("qcl_config::set : no config key '$name' ");
00324                 }
00325                 
00326                 $id                              = $row[$this->key_id];
00327                 $type                    = $row[$this->key_type];
00328                 $permissionWrite = $row[$this->key_permissionWrite];
00329                 $userId                  = $row[$this->key_userId];
00330                 $activeUserId    = $this->user->getActiveUserId(); 
00331 
00332                 // type checking
00333                 $type_error = false;
00334                 switch ( $row[$this->key_type] )
00335                 {
00336                         case "string"   : if ( ! is_string($value) )    $type_error = true; break;
00337                         case "number"   : if ( ! is_numeric($value) )   $type_error = true; break;
00338                         case "boolean"  : if ( ! is_bool($value) )              $type_error = true; break;
00339                 }
00340                 if ( $type_error )
00341                 {
00342                         $this->raiseError("cql_config::set : Invalid type for '$name' (type '$type').");
00343                 }
00344                 
00345                 // users can set their own entry variant with no further checking
00346                 if ( $userId != $activeUserId )
00347                 {
00348                         // but others need to check permission
00349                         $this->user->requirePermission( $permissionWrite );
00350                         
00351                         // create variant if necessary
00352                         if ( $userId === 0 and ! $defaultValue )
00353                         {
00354                                 unset($row[$this->key_id]);
00355                                 $row[$this->key_userId] = $activeUserId;
00356                                 $id = $this->db->insert($this->table,$row);
00357                                 $row[$this->key_id] = $id;
00358                         }
00359                         
00360                         // set default value
00361                         if ( $userId === 0 and $defaultValue )
00362                         {
00363                                 $this->user->requirePermission("qcl.config.permissions.manage");
00364                         }                               
00365                 }               
00366                                 
00367                 // all checks have been passed, set value
00368                 $this->db->execute("
00369                         UPDATE `{$this->table}` 
00370                         SET `{$this->key_value}` = '$value' 
00371                         WHERE `{$this->key_id}` = $id
00372                 ");
00373                 return true;
00374         }

00391         function getPermissionRead($name)
00392         {
00393                 $row = $this->getRow($name);
00394                 return $row[$this->key_permissionRead];

00412          function hasReadAccess($name)
00413          {
00414                 return $this->user->hasPermission($this->getPermissionRead($name));
00415          }
00416         
00422          function hasWriteAccess($name)
00423          {
00424                 return $this->user->hasPermission($this->getPermissionWrite($name));
